entities.description: Sedative medications prescribed for medical use.
Long-lasting or repeated physical or mental health problems caused or worsened by the use of sedatives.
Physical health issues that may be caused or worsened by sedative use.
Mental or emotional health problems that may be caused or worsened by sedative use.
The status of whether or not sedatives have been used in the past 12 months.
The individual answering the survey about their sedative use and its impact on health.
The questionnaire used to gather information on sedative use and its effects.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent continued to use sedatives even though they caused long-lasting or repeated physical or mental health problems.
Indicates that the use of prescription sedatives might cause physical health problems.
Indicates that the use of prescription sedatives might cause mental health problems.
Connects prescription sedatives to any long-lasting or repeated problems caused by their use.
The survey is used to track whether the respondent has used sedatives in the past 12 months.
